data.eml:eml: The smallest Neoptera (Baryshnyalidae fam. n.) from Hagen-Vorhalle (early Late Carboniferous: Namurian B, Germany)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ilger, Jan-Michael, Brauckmann, Carsten (2011): The smallest Neoptera (Baryshnyalidae fam. n.) from Hagen-Vorhalle (early Late Carboniferous: Namurian B, Germany). ZooKeys 130: 91-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.130.1422, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.130.1422
